messages.content: Dear Fellow Resident, Representing my home town of Crawley in Parliament for the past seven years has been the greatest honour of my life. I care passionately about our community and put Crawley first. I have a record of listening to constituents and raising their issues in Parliament. The re-election of a Conservative Government is vital to ensure a strong economy and continued standing up for our community. I am proud of achieving extra funding for Crawley schools, services rebuilding Crawley Hospital, creating further well paid jobs and support to Crawley businesses at Manor Royal Business District. Experience is vital and record of delivery matters. My campaign for a further referendum on the EU should the circumstances change to reflect the views of Crawley voters. Experience matters and I hope to continue as your local MP. A vote for Theresa May ensures strong leadership in the Brexit negotiations, ensuring Crawley's future prosperity. Yours sincerely, Henry Smith

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Crawley's choice is clear - a strong and stable Conservative Government led by Theresa May or a weak unstable coalition led by Jeremy Corbyn.
We need an election to strengthen the Prime Minister's hand in the crucial negotiations with the EU that are about to get underway.
Building a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure well-paid jobs.
Building affordable homes and giving those who rent more security.
Building a more secure and united nation by taking action, ensuring safety and standing up to those who want to divide our nation.

leaflet.additionalNotes: If you want Theresa May not Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister and Henry Smith as local MP, they need your help!
